scripts.startHLF: cd network && docker-compose up; cd .. && npm run tearDownHLF
scripts.tearDownHLF: rm -rf /tmp/hfc-kvs /tmp/hfc-cvs; cd network && docker-compose down; cd .. && npm run clean
scripts.clean: docker rm -f -v $(docker ps -a | grep 'dev-' | awk '{print $1}') 2>/dev/null; docker rmi $(docker images | grep 'dev-' | awk '{print $1}') 2>/dev/null; true
